DOC.brief_summary: Recent evidence suggest anterior insula cortex seem main site interoception . Several study show association change insula function interoception , bodily perception consciousness subject chronic pain . Although osteopathic research demonstrate effective reducing pain , study explore effect osteopathy interoception lacking . Therefore , aim present study explore extent osteopathic treatment could modify interoception parameter measure brain functional connectivity clinical questionnaire .
